recipes.title: Ham Sandwitch
recipes.method: Cut the bread, put butter on bread, put ham & cheese

recipes.title: Spaghetti and Meatballs
recipes.method:
1. In a large pot, bring salted water to a boil. Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.

2. In a large bowl, mix together ground beef, breadcrumbs, egg, garlic, salt, pepper, and parsley. Roll mixture into meatballs.
recipes.description: A classic Italian dish that's sure to satisfy

recipes.title: Spicy Shrimp Linguine
listIngredients: 1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined
recipes.method:
Cook the linguine according to the package directions. Drain and set aside.
In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium-high heat. Add the onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add the garlic and red pepper flakes and cook for another minute, until fragrant.
Add the diced tomatoes (with their juice) and chicken broth to the skillet. Bring to a simmer and cook for about 5 minutes.
Add the shrimp to the skillet and cook until they are pink and cooked through, about 3-5 minutes.
Season the sauce with salt and pepper to taste.
Add the cooked linguine to the skillet and toss until coated in the sauce.
Serve the spicy shrimp linguine in bowls, garnished with fresh parsley.
recipes.description: This spicy shrimp linguine is a quick and easy pasta dish that's perfect for a weeknight dinner. The tender shrimp are coated in a spicy tomato sauce and tossed with linguine for a delicious and satisfying meal.
